title: (x) hard-edged faceted sans - (similar to) Gridnik (various alternatives) {Marc O}
content:
came across this in a book and i could not figure out what typeface it is, can anyone help me out?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeface_4856.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Title typeface for SIERRA magazine - custom design by Jim Parkinson {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/typophile.com/node/39373 "Go to previous forum topic") [YWMAN italic fat face w/ swash ball terminals ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/typophile.com/node/39362 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mattt

comments.content:
Looks like Gridnik, from The Foundry:  
 [http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/ "http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/")

House Industries’ United is another option:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un\_fonts\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un_fonts_sans "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un\_fonts\_sans")

Octin, from Typodermic, might also fit the bill:  
 [http://typodermic.com/151.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/typodermic.com/151.html "http://typodermic.com/151.html")

And from an old thread, this list:

Mandrax (Mario Feliciano)  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/feliciano/bs-mandrax/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/feliciano/bs-mandrax/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/feliciano/bs-mandrax/")

Chunkfeeder (Typeco)  
 [http://www.typeco.com/MainFrameset.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.typeco.com/MainFrameset.html "http://www.typeco.com/MainFrameset.html")

Lingua (Process Type Foundry)  
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/lingua/indexsans.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/lingua/indexsans.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/lingua/indexsans.html")

Gruppe (Boris Moser)  
 [http://www.helldunkel.com/2005/set.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.helldunkel.com/2005/set.htm "http://www.helldunkel.com/2005/set.htm")

Monodon (Cape Arcona)  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/capearcona/ca-monodon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/capearcona/ca-monodon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/capearcona/ca-monodon/")

Vectrex (Lineto)  
Hoboken High (Lineto)  
Container (Lineto)  
 [http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")

Community Service (Your Work For Them)  
Formation (You Work For Them)  
 [http://www.youworkforthem.com/list.php?cat=46](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/list.php?cat=46 "http://www.youworkforthem.com/list.php?cat=46")

45 Degrees (Identikal)  
Camo Sans (Identikal)  
Rally (Identikal)  
 [http://www.identikalshop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126024139/http:/www.identikalshop.com/ "http://www.identikalshop.com")
